titleStmt.title: A Remonstrance to the kingdome, or, An appeale to conscience, as thou wilt answer it at the dreadful day of judgement, whether it be lawfull to take up arms? &c. written by J.H. souldier.
titleStmt.author: J. H., souldier.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
